Posts.Content: Jan 24, 2016 10:12AM theearthlaughsinflowers wrote: Hello everybody~ I have received 24/25 regular treatments and then I have 5 boosts. I am concerned because my RO only wants to boost the areas in my breast where the surgery was- he does not plan to treat my area where I had positive lymph nodes (and all removed). Has this been the case for others that have had an axillary lymph node removal? Thank you,  Pam

Posts.Content: Jan 26, 2016 10:07PM theearthlaughsinflowers wrote: TallnTerrific & Mdoc: I had my first boost today and because my tumor was in the "tail" of my breast it is very close to my lymph nodes involved so the good news is that they are getting the boost like I wanted. My first 25 visits were whole Breast and also included the other node areas (tired now so can't think of their names)- under my arm, along my collarbone and between my breasts. I will be getting 8 boosts
